1: Apartments do not need to be perfect, but should have basic health and safety minimums.
2: Landlords are required to ensure all appliances are in working order (Building Code 12345).
3: Kitchens must be functional and safe (Building Code 67890).
4: Landlords must address leaks promptly to prevent damage (Building Code 11223).
5: Damage caused by leaks must be repaired by the landlord (Building Code 44556).
6: Pest infestations must be managed by the landlord (Health Code 77889).
7: Landlords must be notified in writing of issues (Tenant Rights Act 99001).
8: Landlords must take action within a reasonable time (Tenant Rights Act 22334).
9: Failure to act can be reported to housing authorities (Housing Authority Guidelines).
